movies.title: The Ministry of Paul
movies.plot: Paul's ministry is an act of continuing faith and determination in the face of opposition from both Jewish religious leaders and Roman civil authority. Paul tirelessly crisscrosses the Romans Empire time and time again, preaching the word of Jesus to Jews and Gentiles alike as he establishes Christian communities that would grow into a universal church. We begin with a meeting of the Pharisees, a strict Jewish sect which considers Paul's preaching and success in converting Jews to Christianity as a threat to their survival-a threat they must snuff out. We travel with Paul as he preaches to Jews and Gentiles alike, curing the sick and lame in the name of Jesus. But the Pharisees are unrelenting in their opposition to Paul's " blasphemy" arranging to have stoned. Paul continues his ministry, traveling about the lands of the Romans Empire where he and Silas are whipped and thrown into prison for preaching Christianity. Trapped in prison, they put there faith in the Lord and a massive ...

biography.bio: Ray Porter is an actor and casting director, known for Almost Famous (2000), Argo (2012) and The Runaways (2010).
biography.name: Ray Porter

biography.bio: Jim Pemble is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Jim Pemble

biography.bio: Dion Luther is an actor and producer, known for The Beachcombers (1972), Follow the Bitch (1996) and Def Jam Vendetta (2003).
biography.name: Dion Luther

biography.bio: Scott Douglas was born on June 16, 1927 in El Paso, Texas, USA as James Hicks. He was an actor, known for The Turning Point (1977), The Dead Talk Back (1993) and Bundle of Joy (1956). He died on March 26, 1996 in New York City, New York, USA.
biography.name: Scott Douglas

biography.bio: Paul O'Connor is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Paul O'Connor

biography.bio: Johnathon Toppo is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Clandestiny (1996).
biography.name: Johnathon Toppo

biography.bio: Phil Hubbard is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Phil Hubbard

biography.bio: Morgan Duncan is a writer and director, known for Lightning Ridge, Parfum Fatale (2015) and Hatchet Men (2017).
biography.name: Morgan Duncan

biography.bio: Anthony De Fonte was born on October 23, 1947 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. He is an actor, known for Beverly Hills Cop (1984), Guts and Glory: The Rise and Fall of Oliver North (1989) and Deadly Alliance (1982).
biography.name: Anthony De Fonte

biography.bio: Gregg Coffin is an actor, known for Animated Hero Classics (1991), Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Gregg Coffin

biography.bio: Joe Cronin is an actor, known for Elephant (2003), The Haunting of Sarah Hardy (1989) and Nick Bradley Might Be an Alcoholic (2010).
biography.name: Joe Cronin

biography.bio: Bob Eric Hart was born as Robert E. Hartenberger. He is an actor, known for Full Metal Jacket (1987), Meet the Deedles (1998) and Nobody's Baby (2001).
biography.name: Bob Eric Hart
